programme.desc: Furry, feathered, scaly and sick? Pol Vet will treat anyone who isn‚Äôt human, and sees a variety of rare and unusual creature companions. Doc can check a cow for pregnancy, but how about a camel? A turtle with indigestion, chinchilla checkup and kangaroo toothache keep things interesting at the clinic, and when Merlin the macaw has an overgrown beak, Dr. Pol gives him a much needed macaw-icure.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol & Diane welcome a new Friesian filly to the family. Dr. Lisa handles two Corgi emergencies, and Dr. Olivia gets help treating two dogs with curious wounds. Doc treats a mini horse with excessive thirst and a chicken with a paralyzed crop. An emotional support rabbit needs a checkup before heading off to college, and clinic staffer, Hilary, brings in one of her own dogs for veterinary care. .

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo: Tampa: Compilation
programme.desc: Fall in love with the Asian and Australian animals of Zoo Tampa! In this special episode, a sun bear has a date with the dentist, a duo of clouded leopards explores their new habitat, the zoo says goodbye to a beloved koala, and a pair of rhinos make a love connection.

programme.title: Heartland Docs, Dvm
programme.desc: The Schroeders are put to the test with some unruly patients and unexpected emergencies. They castrate an aggressive alpaca, bring a mama dog back from the brink of death and save a horse from bleeding out after sustaining a grisly gash.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.desc: The docs at Critter Fixer quickly help a boxer with an allergic reaction to yellowjackets, calm an American Quarter Horse who kicked his owner, an 11-year-old aspiring racing partner. Three goats are consumed by parasites while the docs treat one of the most insidious threats to dogs everywhere. Plus, a box turtle needs an abscess drained and Hershey the Chihuahua undergoes a C-section.

programme.title: Battle of the Swamp Dragons
programme.desc: South Florida is the only place on Earth that is home to both the American alligator and the American crocodile (and most recently, the Nile crocodile). But who is the baddest Florida predator? In this croc vs.

programme.title: The Way of The Cheetah
programme.desc: Set in Kenya, the story tells of how Immani protects her 4 cubs against other male cheetah and other predators. By Dereck and Beverly Joubert.
